name: Curse of the dungeon (itch) (ENOOPS Games)
description:
You will have to explore amazing places to get to the innermost secret of your soul.

All actions in the game take place in a cursed abandoned dungeon where you have to explore mysterious signs and prove yourself to reveal all the secrets of this dungeon.

Throughout the game, you will have to explore mysterious underground structures. Overcome various obstacles on your way. Experience all the emotions in this exciting journey!
